Of Catholics that region had but few 3 all the other congregations there, located among a fairly dense population, were under the wretched influence of the Donatist error, so that in this town there was no Catholio at all. In the mercy of God it came about that all those districts became attached to the unity of the Church ; it would take too long to tell you what toil and danger that involved us in, such that the priests there, who were originally appointed by us to gather them b together, were robbed, beaten, maimed, blinded, and killed 3 yet their sufferings were not ineffectual or unfruitful, for by them unity was there securely achieved.
